slogan: Let you know the current air quality

contact_info.name: Contact information
contact_info.contact_us_intro: You can send an e-mail to {email}，and also interact with {site_name} community

licenses_information.name: Licenses information
licenses_information.project_description: How 好空氣 是開源專案，採用 Apache2.0 授權條款，程式碼皆在 Github 上管理。
licenses_information.about_page_header_img: The background image on {about_page} is derived from '六輕工廠' by {bg_about_author} and under {license}

activity_guidance.sensitive_groups: Adults and children with lung problems, and adults with heart problems, who experience symptoms, should consider reducing strenuous physical activity, particularly outdoors

activity_guidance.general_public: Anyone experiencing discomfort such as sore eyes, cough or sore throat should consider reducing activity, particularly outdoors
activity_guidance.sensitive_groups:
• Adults and children with lung problems, and adults with heart problems, should reduce strenuous physical exertion, particularly outdoors, and particularly if they experience symptoms
  • People with asthma may find they need to use their reliever inhaler more often
  • Older people should also reduce physical exertion

activity_guidance.general_public: Reduce physical exertion, particularly outdoors, especially if you experience symptoms such as cough or sore throat
activity_guidance.sensitive_groups:
• Adults and children with lung problems, adults with heart problems, and older people, should avoid strenuous physical activity
  • People with asthma may find they need to use their reliever inhaler more often
